document.full_text: the proposed rule change, which is likely to be challenged by environmentalists, states that gray wolves are thriving in the region, with more than 4,000 counted in minnesota, wisconsin and michigan's upper peninsula.
document.title: agency seeks again to delist great lakes wolves
